info.title: TáComQuem API
info.description: API para gestão de empréstimos pessoais entre amigos

post.description: Register a new user with email and password
Verify email address with token sent via email
Reset password with token from email
Refresh access token using refresh token

get.description: List all items owned by the current user
Get a specific item by ID

post.description: Create a new loan and generate a confirmation link

get.description: List all loans for the authenticated user

post.description: Send a reminder for a loan

get.description: Get public loan information via token (no authentication required)

post.description: Confirm a loan by token (requires authentication)

get.description: Get dashboard data for the authenticated user
Get list of friends for the authenticated user
Get dashboard statistics (requires ANALYST role or higher)
Get user statistics (requires ANALYST role or higher)
Get loan statistics (requires ANALYST role or higher)
List all users (requires ANALYST role or higher)
Get user details (requires SUPPORT role or higher)
Get item details for moderation (requires SUPPORT role or higher)

delete.description: Remove an item (requires MODERATOR role or higher)

get.description: Get loan details for moderation (requires SUPPORT role or higher)

post.description: Cancel a loan for moderation (requires MODERATOR role or higher)

get.description: List all admin users (requires SUPER_ADMIN role)

post.description: Promote a user to admin (requires SUPER_ADMIN role)

patch.description: Change an admin role (requires SUPER_ADMIN role)
